rules_text: Create a 1/1 white and black Rebel creature token, then teach a creature you control first strike. [i](Put a counter of that kind on it. If it already has that ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The Khazran train in city ruins long since deserted by the very Gods they aim to topple.[/i]
